Subject: Re: Questions Comments?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=435352480; y=bRGrlmnqHq4rdTVGT7nWKvncuSLv_A7kk3mSv0XBXDnC-5yI7dQvtQ
X-Yahoo-Profile: supercyclonus

Heya, :)

Please guys, don't just take on new forms all willy nilly here :) In
the movie it seemed to be the way, but remember in the Beast Wars
cartoon it didn't really happen unless something catastrophic
happened. So for here it is more of a process, usually involving a CR
chamber or being a new protoform. In essence you have to be 'reset' to
protoform status and then you can rescan for a new unit.

I don't mind folks wanting to change into new forms, but once you do
you are stuck with it for a while unless you are ready to spend some
down time to do it. Just talk to me first please. It makes things so
much easier :)

Plus wasn't nightshift going for a feline beast mode at one point? I
don't see beast modes being like clothing that you can just put on and
take off. :)

- Preston
